text: Younes Delfi (; born 2 October 2000 in Shush) is an Iranian professional footballer who plays as a forward for HNK Gorica in the Croatian First Football League, on loan from Belgian club Charleroi. He is the youngest Iranian player to have played in Europe. ==International career== Delfi is a very technical player displaying his talent initially at the 2017 FIFA U-17 World Cup in India. He burst onto the scene by recording 2 goals and 1 assist in the group stages of the competition.
